alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 16 at 3:05AM MDT until March 16 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow continues. Additional snow accumulation of up to 2 inches possible, mainly at elevations above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Outdoor recreation could become life threatening to those caught unprepared for severe winter conditions. Hikers and snowmobilers may easily become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
